description:
A trail along Dickson River with cascading waterfalls. A boardwalk leads from the summer road with a great lookoff at the beginning. 
A beautiful gully that examplifies what Fundy National Park is all about, with rock outcrops, and mixed forests.

(edited by Shannon Burt, -East Coast editor)
directions: From Alma,NB enter Fundy National Park. At the park adminstration site follw the road to Wolfepoint. The trailhead is well marked on the highway.
title: Dickson Falls
